item.description:
Not sure what time this is taking place. Who wants to give me a hand filming our "elected" officials trying to answer a few questions?

Brown Christmas

Not to be outdone by the senior senator, U.S. Sen. Scott Brown is celebrating his first Christmas in the U.S. Senate with a soiree of his own.

The GOP star has no fear of the P.C. police, dubbing the Dec. 3 fund-raiser Christmas with Senator Brown. The $100-per-person party will take place at the Boston Park Plaza Hotel, where Brown celebrated his stunning victory over state Attorney General Martha Coakley in January.

Brownâ€™s daughter, Ayla, and fellow American Idol alum Ace Young will perform at the fete with Boston College pigskin prince Doug Flutie and the Flutie Brothers Band.

http://bostonherald.c...

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Crash Sen. Scott Brown's Christmas party
